attributes.action: Link MP s salary to National GDP following Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The linking of salary to GDP will help ensure all parties concentrate on ensuring EU deals are agreed and the national wealth and welfare prioritised. If they don’t, their overly generous pay and pensions will be reduced in line with growth or recession figures. If the country does well, their salaries will also increase.
attributes.background: As MP’s on all sides have shown a complete disregard as to what is best for the Uk and instead concentrated on what is best for their own party, we should link their salary to GDP post brexit so that they have an interest in ensuring that Brexit is a success.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
